thread.title: Rahul Kapoor and Anara Gupta together
thread.title_full: Rahul Kapoor and Anara Gupta together - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rahul Kapoor and Anara Gupta together
text:
Made under Digimech Telefilms Productions, shooting of 'Dulha Hindustani' has begun. Bhojpuri film world's most popular jodi, Rahul Kapoor and Anara Gupta will be seen together in the film. Rahul will be seen playing the role of a cop while Anara will be seen as a fun loving girl in the film.
Rahul Kapoor will be seen in second lead in the film. Talking about the film he says, "I feel fortunate to be working with such great men. I am learning a lot from all of them. This is an exciting phase in my career. "
Stay
